mapper.select:
select vi.id, vi.vehicle_no, vi.vehicle_number, vi.vehicle_color, vi.name, vi.engine_no, vi.emission_standard, vi.fuel_type, vi.images, vi.content, vi.create_date, vi.user_id, ui.code, ui.name as userName, ui.images, ui.phone, ui.email from vehicle_info vi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = vi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND vi.vehicle_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vehicleInfo.vehicleNumber},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vehicleInfo.userName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{vehicleInfo.userId}
order by vi.create_date desc
